dcterms:creator: M. Marcus
B. Santorini
M. A. Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: A widely used dataset for language modeling, consisting of 929k training words, 73k validation words, and 82k test words, pre-processed to lower-case with a vocabulary of the most frequent 10k words.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank

dcterms:creator: S. Merity
C. Xiong
J. Bradbury
R. Socher
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from Wikipedia articles, designed for language modeling, featuring punctuation, original casing, and a larger vocabulary than the Penn Treebank.
dcterms:title: WikiText-2

dcterms:creator: S. Merity
C. Xiong
J. Bradbury
R. Socher
dcterms:description: An extended version of the WikiText dataset, containing over 103 million words, aimed at providing a benchmark for language modeling with a focus on long-range dependencies.
dcterms:title: WikiText-103
